businessProfile.name: Golden Crust Pizza and Tap
businessProfile.address: 4620 N Kedzie Ave, Chicago, IL 60625, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 4620 N Kedzie Ave, Chicago, IL 60625, USA

reviews.text: Went with a friend on a Thursday night for a beer and pizza. The place looked okay but felt run-down, like it hadn‚Äôt had any care in a long time. We tried ordering six different beers, and each time the server had to check and come back apologizing they didn‚Äôt have it. She explained she doesn‚Äôt handle the ordering, so it wasn‚Äôt on her ‚Äî but it was still frustrating. Even with only two parties in the place, it took a while to get our check, and the whole experience just felt off.

We came for a visit from Indiana while here for a Cubs game. It was close to our Airbnb - but highly recommend. We had the fried veggies, mozzarella sticks and coconut shrimp as apps. They were great! Then we moved on to the meat lovers pizza and Mediterranean pizzas. Both were SO good! Our waitress was fun - drinks were tasty. Highly recommend!

Thin crust cheese pizza and large fresh garden salad pick up order. Both were tasty and reasonably priced. I'm also grateful there is a pizza by the slice option I get sometimes too. Looking forward to the thin crust promotion on Mondays to reorder another pizza!

Been going to GC for over 40 years. My go to neighborhood pizza. The patio is amazing. We go to watch Chicago sports teams there on the huge tvs outside. Get that bucket of cold refreshments and enjoy.

Can't get better pizza in the city. Greek salad with added chicken breast is very impressive! The feta used is creamy and just comes together so nicely with the dressing. Can't say much for the other food since this is our go to for pizza only. GET THE SALAD WITH YOUR PIZZA! Compliments each other beautifully.

editorial_summary.overview: Old-school pizzeria serving 3 styles of pies plus large portions of red-sauce Italian classics.

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

Can't say much for the other food since this is our go to for pizza only. GET THE SALAD WITH YOUR PIZZA! Compliments each other beautifully.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.4/5 rating from 5 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the variety and quality of appetizers like fried veggies, mozzarella sticks, and coconut shrimp, which are described as "great" - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The thin crust pizza and the option to buy pizza by the slice are highly appreciated for their taste and convenience - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The patio experience with huge TVs for watching Chicago sports teams is a major draw for customers - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area
Long wait times even with few customers - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews/reputation issues due to unavailable menu items - review management can address this concern

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
